pageContent: Objectives: To compare the specificity and sensitivity of different definitions of biochemical failure in patients treated with high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for prostate cancer, to identify the most accurate predictor of clinical failure after HIFU.

metaData.source:
MRI-compatible positioning device for guiding a focused ultrasound system for transrectal treatment of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24337790/
